title: What are the lyrics of the song 'Billal' by Emiway Bantai? - Quora

response.answer_text: Billal ( DHUND KE DIKHAO ) is a new song by emiway bantai . here u can read lyrics of dhundke dikhao ( Billal Intro). this song`s music given by Robert dar  SUNG BY - EMIWAY BANTAI LYRICS - EMIWAY BANTAI MUSIC - ROBERT TAR LYRICAL VIDEO - NAMAN JAIN Dhund ke Dikha Lyrics - EMIWAY BANTAI Dhund ke dikha Mujhe dhundke dikha Abbe idhar dekh Dhundke dikha Mujhe dhundke dikha Chal Ha ha ha ha Mei hu woh hu jo hu mei slow hu slow hu Slow hu mei mera kash leke dekh Ek nai do hu do hu mei Dhundke dikha Mujhe dhundke dikha Dhundke dikha Dhundke dikha usko jisko Disco jana nai pasand Dhund ke dikha jo unchai pe baitha hai fir bhi rakhta no ghamand Dhundke dikha jo sach sunke sach banke sacha jeeta hai Dhundke dikha Jiske andhar Bible,khuran aur geeta hai Beeta hai jo waqt usse boht kuch usne seekha hai Boht kuch usko hai batana Par Music ka generation feekha hai. In baton ko sunna tu das saal baad fir bolega Yeh bandha teekha hai Kisi ke balboote kuch nahi karna hai Yeh uska tareeka hai Chal dhoondke dikha Mujhe dhoondke dikha For full lyrics click here DHUND KE DIKHA LYRICS BY EMIWAY BANTAI , BILLAL (INTRO)
